combinationIncorrect: Oops! Your email/password combination is incorrect
emailInvalid: The email field must be a valid email
passwordInvalid: The password field must be at least 5 characters
usersNumberRequired: The number of users field is required
usersNumberIncorrect: The number of users field must be an integer
